html:
— Recommendations are independently chosen by Reviewed's editors. Purchases you make through our links may earn us a commission.

Every day, we scour Amazon to find the best deals available. Whether it's something for your kitchen or top-rated tech to upgrade your smart home collection, the online shopping giant offers some of the best prices on a very wide range of items. Whatever you need, Amazon has you covered.

Get deals and shopping advice delivered straight to your phone. Sign up for text message alerts from the experts at Reviewed.

Below, you'll find our top Amazon deals today, including a compact smart home display, a home elliptical machine and some versatile computer monitors, all of which have been vetted by our team of deals experts to make sure they're "best of web" prices. If you're looking for N95 and KN95 masks right now, Amazon also has plenty of choices on sale today, too.

► Presidents Day 2022:  Several sales are still live, shop the best discounts from Solo Stove, Thermoworks and Cocoon by Sealy

► National Margarita Day:  Where to find deals on margaritas, Burger King and more

If you're not already an Amazon Prime subscriber, you can sign up for a 30-day membership for free. An Amazon Prime subscription gets you free two-day shipping and tons of other benefits for $14.99 a month ($7.49 for students and $6.99 for those receiving qualifying government assistance).

Better still, right now, shoppers can receive a $5 discount on their first $10-or-more Amazon app purchase. 

The best Amazon deals of the day

1. Up to 22% off: These powerful computer monitors

Give your computer graphics a visual upgrade with select Samsung monitors on sale at Amazon today. The brand's 24-inch M5 Series FHD 1080p monitor, typically listed for $229.99, is on sale for $30 off or $199.99. Samsung says the monitor not only serves as a great PC tool with Microsoft Office 365 installed, but it can also serve as a streaming TV with the ability to stream from apps including Netflix and HBO Max. For a more expansive view, check out the 34-inch Samsung Odyssey G5 Ultra-Wide gaming monitor for a 22% discount that drops the price to $429.99. The brand says the curved screen can display more imagery while gaming with a 165-hertz refresh rate and one millisecond response time for the smoothest possible gameplay.

Save up to 22% on select Samsung computer monitors

2. Save $35: This multi-purpose smart home display

The Amazon Echo Show 8 can be a helpful home assistant. Typically listed for $109.99, this digital display can be yours for $74.99, a 32% price cut. We're fans of the second generation model ($129.99) and while the older model doesn't have the Zoom support and upgraded camera, it still offers video call support for devices that also have the Alexa app and can control other compatible smart home devices. Whether you have smart home security cameras or a smart home thermostat, the Echo Show 8 can help you manage them both. 

Get the Amazon Echo Show 8 (First Generation) for $74.99 (Save $35)

3. Less than $200: This quiet home exercise machine

Keep your fitness progress going while staying on-task at work with the Cubii JR1 elliptical machine for $199. Typically listed for $279, this exercise machine is now 29% off. When we tested the JR1 we found it to be easily accessible and appreciated its multiple resistance levels. Though not meant to be a full-on replacement for workouts, the whisper-quiet machine lets you stay active on even the longest days at your desk.

Get the Cubii JR1 Seated Under Desk Elliptical Machine for $199 (Save $50)

4. 20% off: This delicious hot sauce

If you like a little zing to your favorite dishes, you can't go wrong with Old Bay hot sauce. You can get a 64-fluid-ounce container of this tasty seasoning for $10.74 thanks to a 20% coupon you can check off on the product page. Old Bay says its sauce is blended with paprika, celery salt, red and black pepper with no added MSG. Whether you want to give some heat to chicken wings or extra flavor to some mac and cheese, Old Bay makes your dishes all the tastier.

Get the Old Bay 64-Fluid-Ounce Hot Sauce for $10.74 with coupon (Save $2.68)

5. Less than $10: These compact air fresheners

If your kitchen or your bathroom needs freshening, these Febreeze Unstopables Paradise air fresheners are essentials. Typically listed for $11.99, you can get a three-pack with Amazon's delivery Subscribe and Save membership for just $8.54, or 29% off, thanks to a $3.45 price cut. With Subscribe and Save, you can get 5% off the delivery of your first order and up to 15% off repeat deliveries that you can schedule to arrive anywhere every two weeks to every six months. Febreeze says these tiny fresheners can eliminate odors in even the smallest home spaces for 45 days.

Get the Febreze Small Spaces Unstopables Paradise Air Freshener 3-Count for $8.54 (Save $3.45)

The best Amazon deals from this week

1. Staub Cast Iron 4-Quart Round Cocotte

If you're looking for some reliable cookware to add to your kitchen, consider the Staub cast iron cocotte. Normally listed for $130.89, this 4-quart round Dutch oven with a glass lid can be yours for as low as $99.95 in cherry red, black and white. We named the larger Staub cast iron 5.5-quart round cocotte (from $324.95) the best Dutch oven we've ever tested, so this smaller model is sure to impress with the tempered glass lid for optimal heat control and a multi-coat enamel—which the brand claims is resistant to chips, scratches and discoloration. The pot is designed for searing, boiling, deep-frying, braising and more in the oven, and works on both induction and traditional stovetops.

Get the Staub Cast Iron 4-Quart Round Cocotte from $99.95 (Save $5.62 to $107.65)

2. Beckham Hotel Collection Bed Pillows

Sleep soundly with a new set of Beckham Hotel Collection bed pillows, the best affordable pillows we've ever tested. Usually selling for $49.99 for the queen size, this set of two plush pillows can be yours for just $31.99 today thanks to the extra 20% coupon on the product page. In testing, we found these cushions felt similar to down and offered optimal support for side sleepers. We especially loved that they were washable and didn't smell after opening (like other synthetic-fill pillows we tested). 

Get the Beckham Hotel Collection Bed Pillows from $31.99 with coupon (Save $16.25 to $18)

3. Apple AirPods Pro

We think the Apple AirPods Pro are some of the best headphones available right now, and you can get the updated version for under $190 right now. We love the Pros for the Active Noise Cancelation that dampened environmental noise and the customizable fit of the buds. This new version adds MagSafe, which means you can hold it near a MagSafe charger and it will snap firmly into place and start charging. Get them now for $189.99—a $59.01 price cut from the $249 list price.

Get the Apple AirPods Pro for $189.99 (Save $59.01)

4. Philips Premium Air Fryer XXL

Air fryers make cooking a whole lot easier, but some of the best models can be pretty pricey. Fortunately, our favorite air fryer, the Philips Premium Airfryer XXL, is currently selling at as much as 43% off at Amazon. Typically listed for $349.95, you can get the 4-quart fryer in black for just $199.95. In testing, we were impressed with this model's large capacity and loved that it made crispy foods (including family-size portions) without preheating. Although this air fryer doesn't have digital controls, making it harder to precisely set the temperature and cooking time, we still found it to be the most user-friendly air fryer we tested. 

Get the Philips Premium Airfryer XXL for $199.95 (Save $136 to $150)

5. iRobot Roomba i3

With spring just around the corner, it's time to start thinking about spring cleaning—or, rather, how you'll make spring cleaning easier on yourself. The iRobot Roomba i3 is one of our favorite Roombas, and right now you can get it for $299.99, saving $50 on an excellent vacuum that incorporates Wi-Fi connected mapping, can connect to Alexa, and is engineered to pick up pet hair and other debris.

Get the iRobot Roomba i3 Wi-Fi Connected Robot Vacuum for $299.99 (Save $50)

Other noteworthy Amazon deals we found 

  • Three-Month Trial of Amazon Music Unlimited for free (Save $29.97)
  • Hertzko Self-Cleaning Slicker Brush for Dogs and Cats for $14.99 (Save $15.29)
  • Lement KN95 Face Mask 50-Pack for $16.88 (Save $12.12)
  • Bella 17289 Double Cooker from $19.50 (Save $1.92 to $3.49)
  • Errbic Solar Charger for $21.59 with coupon (Save $12.40) 
  • Kasa Smart Plug Power Strip for $24.99 (Save $5)
  • H&R Block Tax Software Deluxe + State 2021 PC Download for $28.44 (Save $16.55)
  • BalanceForm Bike Trainer Stand for $34.99 (Save $20.32)
  • JALL Wake Up Light Sunrise Alarm Clock for $40.83 with coupon (Save $5.15)
  • Logitech C920x Pro HD Webcam for $59.99 (Save $10)
  • Logitech G Pro Wireless Gaming Mouse for $77.99 (Save $52)
  • Levoit Core 200S Air Purifier for $79.98 (Save $10.01)
  • Bissell Power Fresh Steam Mop for $82.69 (Save $10)
  • Vornado AVH10 Vortex Heater for $83.99 (Save $41)
  • Bose SoundLink Micro for $99 (Save $20)
  • Ninja BL660 Professional Countertop Blender for $99.99 (Save $20)
  • Fitbit Charge 5 from $145 (Save $30.96 to $34.95)
  • Eufy RoboVac G30 for $229.99 (Save $90)
  • Amazon Fire TV Omni Series 4K UHD Smart TV from $299.99 (Save $110 to $350)
  • Apple Watch Series 7 GPS + Cellular from $449 (Save $39.95 to $249.01)

There's more where this deal came from. Sign up for Reviewed's Perks and Rec newsletter and we'll keep 'em coming every Sunday through Friday.

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook , Twitter , Instagram , TikTok or Flipboard for the latest deals, product reviews and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
